name: Shuut
description:
Addictive shoot 'em up arcade game. There's no way back, no way to flee, you can only fight back! Shoot, shoot and shoot.

Game made by Alexandru Cojocaru (http://xojoc.pw).

Thanks a lot to:
C-toy for the alien spaceships
MillionthVector for the player spaceship
Frank Nora for the background music

The code is in the Public Domain, for the art licenses see the links above.
